description: Allows you run image query on a specific raster data collection to get a list of the satellite imagery matching the selected filters.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the raster data collection.

parameters.name: RasterDataCollectionQuery
parameters.description: RasterDataCollectionQuery consisting of AreaOfInterest(AOI), PropertyFilters and TimeRangeFilterInput used in SearchRasterDataCollection. AreaOfInterest (dict) --- The Area of interest to be used in the search query. AreaOfInterestGeometry (dict) --- A GeoJSON object representing the geographic extent in the coordinate space. MultiPolygonGeometry (dict) --- The structure representing the MultiPolygon Geometry. The coordinates of the multipolygon geometry. (list) --- (list) --- (list) --- (float) --- PolygonGeometry (dict) --- The structure representing Polygon Geometry. Coordinates representing a Polygon based on the GeoJson spec. (list) --- (list) --- (float) --- BandFilter (list) --- The list of Bands to be displayed in the result for each item. (string) --- PropertyFilters (dict) --- The Property Filters used in the search query. LogicalOperator (string) --- The Logical Operator used to combine the Property Filters. Properties (list) --- A list of Property Filters. (dict) --- The structure representing a single PropertyFilter. Represents a single property to match with when searching a raster data collection. EoCloudCover (dict) --- The structure representing EoCloudCover property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound. Lower bound for EoCloudCover. Upper bound for EoCloudCover. LandsatCloudCoverLand (dict) --- The structure representing Land Cloud Cover property filter for Landsat collection containing a lower bound and upper bound. The minimum value for Land Cloud Cover property filter. This will filter items having Land Cloud Cover greater than or equal to this value. The maximum value for Land Cloud Cover property filter. This will filter items having Land Cloud Cover less than or equal to this value. Platform (dict) --- The structure representing Platform property filter consisting of value and comparison operator. ComparisonOperator (string) --- The ComparisonOperator to use with PlatformInput. The value of the platform. ViewOffNadir (dict) --- The structure representing ViewOffNadir property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound. The minimum value for ViewOffNadir property filter. This filters items having ViewOffNadir greater than or equal to this value. The maximum value for ViewOffNadir property filter. This filters items having ViewOffNadir lesser than or equal to this value. ViewSunAzimuth (dict) --- The structure representing ViewSunAzimuth property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound. The minimum value for ViewSunAzimuth property filter. This filters items having ViewSunAzimuth greater than or equal to this value. The maximum value for ViewSunAzimuth property filter. This filters items having ViewSunAzimuth lesser than or equal to this value. ViewSunElevation (dict) --- The structure representing ViewSunElevation property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound. The lower bound to view the sun elevation. The upper bound to view the sun elevation. The TimeRange Filter used in the search query. The end time for the time-range filter. The start time for the time-range filter.

nested_params.name: AreaOfInterest
nested_params.description: The Area of interest to be used in the search query.

nested_params.name: AreaOfInterestGeometry
nested_params.description: A GeoJSON object representing the geographic extent in the coordinate space.

nested_params.description: The structure representing the MultiPolygon Geometry.

nested_params.name: Coordinates
nested_params.description: The coordinates of the multipolygon geometry.

nested_params.name: PolygonGeometry
nested_params.description: The structure representing Polygon Geometry.

nested_params.name: Coordinates
nested_params.description: Coordinates representing a Polygon based on the GeoJson spec.

nested_params.name: BandFilter
nested_params.description: The list of Bands to be displayed in the result for each item.

nested_params.name: PropertyFilters
nested_params.description: The Property Filters used in the search query.

nested_params.name: LogicalOperator
nested_params.description: The Logical Operator used to combine the Property Filters.

nested_params.name: Properties
nested_params.description: A list of Property Filters.

nested_params.name: Property
nested_params.description: Represents a single property to match with when searching a raster data collection.

nested_params.name: EoCloudCover
nested_params.description: The structure representing EoCloudCover property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_params.name: LowerBound
nested_params.description: Lower bound for EoCloudCover.

nested_params.name: UpperBound
nested_params.description: Upper bound for EoCloudCover.

nested_params.name: LandsatCloudCoverLand
nested_params.description: The structure representing Land Cloud Cover property filter for Landsat collection containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_params.name: LowerBound
nested_params.description: The minimum value for Land Cloud Cover property filter. This will filter items having Land Cloud Cover greater than or equal to this value.

nested_params.name: UpperBound
nested_params.description: The maximum value for Land Cloud Cover property filter. This will filter items having Land Cloud Cover less than or equal to this value.

nested_params.name: Platform
nested_params.description: The structure representing Platform property filter consisting of value and comparison operator.

nested_params.name: ComparisonOperator
nested_params.description: The ComparisonOperator to use with PlatformInput.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the platform.

nested_params.name: ViewOffNadir
nested_params.description: The structure representing ViewOffNadir property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_params.name: LowerBound
nested_params.description: The minimum value for ViewOffNadir property filter. This filters items having ViewOffNadir greater than or equal to this value.

nested_params.name: UpperBound
nested_params.description: The maximum value for ViewOffNadir property filter. This filters items having ViewOffNadir lesser than or equal to this value.

nested_params.name: ViewSunAzimuth
nested_params.description: The structure representing ViewSunAzimuth property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_params.name: LowerBound
nested_params.description: The minimum value for ViewSunAzimuth property filter. This filters items having ViewSunAzimuth greater than or equal to this value.

nested_params.name: UpperBound
nested_params.description: The maximum value for ViewSunAzimuth property filter. This filters items having ViewSunAzimuth lesser than or equal to this value.

nested_params.name: ViewSunElevation
nested_params.description: The structure representing ViewSunElevation property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_params.name: LowerBound
nested_params.description: The lower bound to view the sun elevation.

nested_params.name: UpperBound
nested_params.description: The upper bound to view the sun elevation.

nested_params.name: TimeRangeFilter
nested_params.description: The TimeRange Filter used in the search query.

nested_params.name: EndTime
nested_params.description: The end time for the time-range filter.

nested_params.name: StartTime
nested_params.description: The start time for the time-range filter.

nested_items.name: ApproximateResultCount
nested_items.description: Approximate number of results in the response.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: List of items matching the Raster DataCollectionQuery.

nested_items.name: DateTime
nested_items.description: The searchable date and time of the item, in UTC.

nested_items.name: Coordinates
nested_items.description: The coordinates of the GeoJson Geometry.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: GeoJson Geometry types like Polygon and MultiPolygon.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: A unique Id for the source item.

nested_items.name: Properties
nested_items.description: This field contains additional properties of the item.

nested_items.name: LandsatCloudCoverLand
nested_items.description: Land cloud cover for Landsat Data Collection.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: Platform property. Platform refers to the unique name of the specific platform the instrument is attached to. For satellites it is the name of the satellite, eg. landsat-8 (Landsat-8), sentinel-2a.

nested_items.name: ViewOffNadir
nested_items.description: The angle from the sensor between nadir (straight down) and the scene center. Measured in degrees (0-90).

nested_items.name: ViewSunAzimuth
nested_items.description: The sun azimuth angle. From the scene center point on the ground, this is the angle between truth north and the sun. Measured clockwise in degrees (0-360).

nested_items.name: ViewSunElevation
nested_items.description: The sun elevation angle. The angle from the tangent of the scene center point to the sun. Measured from the horizon in degrees (-90-90). Negative values indicate the sun is below the horizon, e.g. sun elevation of -10Â° means the data was captured during nautical twilight.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous response was truncated, you receive this token. Use it in your next request to receive the next set of results.
